医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
与帕金森病相关的遗传变异比估计的更常见新研究发现，与帕金森病 (PD) 相关的遗传变异比研究人员之前认为的更为常见。帕金森病基金会支持的 PD GENEration 研究（今年春天提前达到了 15,000 名参与者的目标）的研究人员发现，13% 的参与者患有遗传性 PD，与长期估计相比，这是一个重要的观察结果。该研究的前 3.5 年调查了广泛的北美队列，其结果发表在同行评审的科学杂志《Brain》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Genetic-variants-linked-with-Parkinsons-more-common-than-estimated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Genetic-variants-linked-with-Parkinsons-more-common-than-estimated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77203b1a-0d40-46b1-815e-222add938c56 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 00:13:05 -0400 Genetic variants associated with Parkinson's more common than estimated
医院成瘾咨询服务有望提高阿片类药物使用障碍治疗的采用率先前的研究发现，超过 80% 的阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 患者没有接受循证救生药物治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Hospital-based-addiction-consult-services-show-promise-in-improving-opioid-use-disorder-treatment-uptake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Hospital-based-addiction-consult-services-show-promise-in-improving-opioid-use-disorder-treatment-uptake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb552ef3-436a-4c0c-8b00-36036eb6cf88 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 23:16:00 -0400 Hospital-based addiction consult services show promise in improving opioid use disorder treatment uptake
研究揭示 IL-22BP 蛋白在肠道健康和感染抵抗力中的作用《美国国家科学院院刊》(PNAS) 上报道的一项研究表明，一种名为 IL-22BP 的特定蛋白质的存在如何影响肠道微生物群的组成以及人体对细菌感染的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Study-reveals-IL-22BP- Proteins-role-in-gut-health-and-infection-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Study-reveals-IL-22BP- Proteins-role-in-gut-health-and-infection-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e8a4720-a20d-483c-8758-c9968f2f2211 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 23:12:00 -0400 Study reveals IL-22BP protein's role in gut health and infection resistance
减肥有保障！但对你的饮食有什么影响呢？ GLP-1 和 GIP/GLP-1 干预措施综述研究人员回顾了 GLP-1 和 GIP/GLP-1 受体激动剂对肥胖和 T2D 患者饮食影响的研究，发现热量显着减少，但对饮食成分的评估有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Weight-loss-guaranteed!-But-what-impact-on-your-diet-A-review-of-GLP-1-and-GIPGLP-1 -干预措施.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Weight-loss-guaranteed!-But-what-impact-on-your-diet-A-review-of-GLP-1-and-GIPGLP-1 -interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=739f08e6-deb6-4138-add0-1aa80f150a11 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 23:10:00 -0400 Weight loss guaranteed! But what impact on your diet? A review of GLP-1 and GIP/GLP-1 interventions
大蒜是对抗动脉粥样硬化的有力武器研究人员发现大蒜具有通过调节铁死亡和减少脂质过氧化来治疗动脉粥样硬化的潜力，为当前的治疗提供了更安全的替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Garlic-as-a-pot-weapon-against-atherosclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Garlic-as-a-potted-weapon-against-atherosclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88860bfe-c586-448d-8438-17ab0191ed69 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:44:00 -0400 Garlic as a potent weapon against atherosclerosis
DNA修复基因突变预测膀胱癌对新辅助化疗的反应对 105 名局部肌层浸润性膀胱癌患者的治疗前肿瘤标本进行分析发现，已知与 DNA 损伤修复有关的三个基因中任何一个的突变与顺铂的完全病理反应相关。基于膀胱手术时的病理降期测量的新辅助化疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/DNA-repair-gene-mutations-predict-bladder-cancer-response-to-neoadjuvant-chemotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/DNA-repair-gene-mutations-predict-bladder-cancer-response-to-neoadjuvant-chemotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9dc3753-4232-4e5a-8b63-e975be5770f7 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:44:00 -0400 DNA repair gene mutations predict bladder cancer response to neoadjuvant chemotherapy
开创性的研究表明门诊引产对初为人母的人来说是安全的在第一项此类研究中，RCSI 医学与健康科学大学和都柏林 Rotunda 医院的研究人员表明，对于初为人母的人来说，在舒适的环境中度过低风险引产的前 24 小时是安全的。他们自己的家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Groundwriting-study-shows-safety-of-out Patient-labor-induction-for-first-time-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Groundwriting-study-shows-safety-of-out Patient-labor-induction-for-first-time-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d94a34f-573e-4e57-aac2-88d9e71b5a87 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:39:00 -0400 Groundbreaking study shows safety of outpatient labor induction for first-time mothers
类风湿关节炎的炎症活动影响认知功能发表在开放获取期刊 RMD Open 上的一项小型比较研究发现，类风湿性关节炎引起的体内炎症活动与特定的认知障碍有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Inflammatory-activity-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-impacts-cognitive-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Inflammatory-activity-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-impacts-cognitive-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e90de316-d2b6-4eec-aa5c-c09077211346 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:24:07 -0400 Inflammatory activity in rheumatoid arthritis impacts cognitive function
运甲状腺素蛋白水平与心力衰竭和死亡率相关阿拉巴马大学伯明翰分校 Marnix E. Heersink 医学院的医生科学家发现了关于转甲状腺素蛋白（TTR）蛋白质水平对心脏病风险影响的重要发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Transthyretin- Protein-levels-linked-to-heart-failure-and-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Transthyretin- Protein-levels-linked-to-heart-failure-and-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43cae6e6-fad9-489b-9af0-d778f82b1e02 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:19:24 -0400 Transthyretin protein levels linked to heart failure and mortality
尽管疼痛，体力活动和积极影响仍可提高患有纤维肌痛的女性的认知能力研究人员发现，即使疼痛严重程度很高，体力活动和积极情绪也可以改善患有纤维肌痛的女性的认知能力。促进两者的结合可以减轻慢性疼痛对认知的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Physical-activity-and-positive-affect-boost-cognition-in-women-with-太多纤维肌痛-despite-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240729/Physical-activity-and-positive-affect-boost-cognition-in-women-with-太多纤维肌痛-despite-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ff83cc9-d36a-4c98-b366-817c8e81cccc Mon, 29 Jul 2024 22:18:00 -0400 Physical activity and positive affect boost cognition in women with fibromyalgia despite pain
